original: Aren, Gustav Ingvar, jur. kand., kapten, Linköping, f. 15/6/12 i Norrköp. av överlär. Emanuel A. o. folk-sk :ilär :an Gerda Åberg. G. 42 m. Margareta Axelsson. Barn: Ingrid f. 46. — Stud:ex. i NorrkÖp. 31, jur. kand. i Upps. 39. Fänrik i res, 34, kapt. i res. 44. E. not. v. Sthlms rådhusr. 39, kamr. v. A-B Ostgöta Corresponden-tens Boktryckeri sed, 41. Und. stud:-tiden div. befattn. v. Östgöta nat. i Upps. Medl. av Juvenalorden. Hob-bies: sång, fiske.
translated: Aren, Gustav Ingvar, Juris Doctor, Captain, Linköping, born June 15th, 1912 in Norrköping to headteacher Emanuel A. and elementary school teacher Gerda Åberg. Married in 1942 to Margareta Axelsson with one child, Ingrid, born in 1946. Completed high school in Norrkoping in 1931 and obtained his Juris Doctor degree in Uppsala in 1939. Commissioned as Second Lieutenant in the reserve in 1934 and promoted to Captain in the reserve in 1944. Employed as a notary public at Stockholm City Hall in 1939, and as an accountant at A-B Ostgöta Correspondentens Printing Office since 1941. Held various positions at Östgöta Nation in Uppsala during his studies. Member of the Juvenal Order. Hobbies include singing and fishing.

structured.name: Gustav Ingvar Aren
jobTitle: Notary Public at Stockholm City Hall
Accountant at A-B Ostgöta Correspondentens Printing Office
structured.description: Swedish jurist and military officer, known for his expertise in tax law. Also known for his hobbies in singing and fishing.
